3M(TM) Scotch-Weld(TM) Neoprene Rubber And Gasket Adhesive 2141 Light Yellow, 5 Gallon Pail, 1 per case. Note: This product is restricted for industrial applications in the following states: CT, DC, DE, ME, MD, MA, NJ, NY, PA, RI, VA, IL, IN, OH and NC. E

  • 3M™ Neoprene High Performance Rubber and Gasket Adhesive 2141 is an all-around reliable synthetic rubber adhesive, best used in general industrial applications

  • It is a high-strength adhesive with a light yellow appearance that dries clear.

  • Light yellow adhesive dries clear
